name: Crappy Cupcake Ninja
description:
Entry for Lazy-Jam 2.

You play as a cupcake ninja that must flee from an ominous wall of death. You can go extremely fast but that might lead to your doom. Collect cups to protect yourself from death once.

Note: I dev on Windows, so the Linux and Mac executables are untested and unverified, don't blame me if they don't work.
